name: KISSES ON VELOCITY
description:
70km/h with music
hundreds of kilometers on the love tracks
millions of urban lights dimmed
billions of hidden stars 
gleamed

37.5 degrees in the bodies
side by side with racing hearts and sweaty palms
with me staring at your profile
you secretly glancing at mine, we
radiated

talks of reality, of dreams and disbelief
tracing the lines and curves of you
mapping your skin 
fully extended seat belt on your embrace
kisses on velocity

then i fell asleep on your lap
blanketed with your scent
heated by your breath
as i surrender my tired heart
to you

—

A scene kept in memory, revisited from time to time in the span of a decade.

Image captured using iPhone 11 pro, on a toll road somewhere between Jakarta and Yogyakarta, Indonesia, 2021.

jpeg
2048 x 1153
